item.description: This is a casual weekly conversation group for anyone with interest in Portuguese. Â All levels are welcomed from beginners to those who have lived in Brazil/Portugal for several years to ex-pats. Beginners are encouraged to bring their study materials and questions about vocabulary, grammar, conjugation, etc. for the advanced speakers.

group.name: The Boston/Cambridge Portuguese Language Meetup Group

item.name: Lazy Sundays - Learn & practice Portuguese
